https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/t468xcoBSlfLdnYvBcXMQN9MEmM.jpg 14-year-old Amina from northern Ghana gets sent away to Burkina Faso by her mother to prevent her marriage to an elderly man. However, fate intervenes in the form of kidnappers who bring her to Accra. What trials and tribulations await Amina in the slums of Accra? Will she ever find a way to escape? Azali
